answerText: My Name is Red[10] This Turkish author wrote My Name is Red as well as the novel focusing on Ka, Snow.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | 8 | 5 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: In this novel, Black, Enishte's nephew, is in love with Shekure, Enishte's daughter. FTPE: [10] Name the novel in which Elegant Effendi is a miniaturist who is murdered during the reign of Murad III in the Ottoman Empire.
